Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires the commissioner of parks, recreation and historic preservation to acquire the mineral interests under all land acquired or received by such office
Summary: Requires the commissioner of parks, recreation and historic preservation to acquire the mineral interests under all land acquired or received by the state for the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation, unless the commissioner of parks, recreation and historic preservation finds that the land is of great significance and importance to the state.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง3.17, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to requiring the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to acquire all mineral rights to real property acquired by such office
